message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay closer to my budget.  I'm willing to offer $10500 for the product.  What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $11500. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my budget.  How about $11000? It's a fair price for both of us.
I understand you're trying to get closer to your budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession and counteroffer at $11750. What do you think?
